summary: Tested 'Import from JSON' feature implementation in Form Config admin page. All features working correctly - Import from JSON button visible in Preview Mode dialog, Copy as JSON functional, category selector works, file input accepts JSON files.

issues: Minor: Chart width/height console warnings - 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0' - persists from previous iterations
Minor: MUI Grid deprecated props warnings (item, xs, sm, md) - should migrate to Grid v2

context_for_next_testing_agent: Import from JSON feature tested and verified working. Button visible in Preview Mode dialog footer next to Copy as JSON button.

import_from_json_button_visibility.details: Import from JSON button is visible in the Preview Mode dialog footer, positioned next to the Copy as JSON button. Button has orange/secondary color with FileUpload icon.

copy_as_json_button.details: Copy as JSON button is visible and functional. Button shows 'Copied!' feedback state after clicking (verified in previous iteration 106).

import_json_file_picker.details: Import from JSON button has hidden file input with accept='.json,application/json'. Clicking the button opens file picker for JSON files only.

preview_mode_category_preview.details: Preview Mode dialog shows category-specific form configuration preview including Title, Description, Condition, Price, Listed by options, Contact Methods, and Preferences.

category_selector_in_preview.details: Category dropdown selector is present in Preview Mode dialog. Allows selection of different categories (Default (Fallback), Auto & Vehicles, Properties, etc.) to preview their configurations.

buttons_in_dialog_footer: Copy as JSON button - visible (verified by Playwright query_selector)
Import from JSON button - visible (verified in screenshots)
Filter Configs for This Category button - visible

file_input_configuration.location: Inside Import from JSON button component

verification_evidence.import_handler: handleImportJson function (lines 455-638 in form-config/page.tsx) validates JSON structure and imports placeholders, seller_type, preferences, and visibility_rules

screenshots_taken: .screenshots/05_form_config_page.png - Form Config page with Preview Mode button
.screenshots/06_preview_mode_dialog.png - Preview Mode dialog with both buttons visible
.screenshots/14_final_preview_dialog.png - Final verification showing both buttons in footer
